parts.text: {"word":"produrre","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"生産する、製造する、作り出す","english_definition":"to produce, manufacture, create","examples":[{"sentence":"Questa fabbrica produce automobili.","translation":"This factory produces cars."},{"sentence":"L'azienda produce energia solare.","translation":"The company produces solar energy."},{"sentence":"Questo terreno produce un ottimo vino.","translation":"This land produces excellent wine."}],"collocations":["produrre beni (produce goods)","produrre energia (produce energy)","produrre un effetto (produce an effect)","produrre un film (produce a film)"],"synonyms":["creare","fabbricare","generare","realizzare"],"antonyms":["consumare","distruggere"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"引き起こす、もたらす、生じさせる","english_definition":"to cause, bring about, generate","examples":[{"sentence":"La sua decisione ha prodotto molte polemiche.","translation":"His decision caused a lot of controversy."},{"sentence":"L'incendio ha prodotto danni ingenti.","translation":"The fire caused extensive damage."},{"sentence":"La sua testimonianza ha prodotto un cambiamento nella situazione.","translation":"His testimony brought about a change in the situation."}],"collocations":["produrre danni (cause damage)","produrre effetti (cause effects)","produrre risultati (produce results)","produrre cambiamenti (cause changes)"],"synonyms":["causare","determinare","generare","provocare"],"antonyms":["prevenire","evitare"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"提出する、提示する、示す","english_definition":"to present, submit, show","examples":[{"sentence":"Devi produrre i documenti necessari.","translation":"You must submit the necessary documents."},{"sentence":"Ha prodotto una scusa poco credibile.","translation":"He offered a rather unbelievable excuse."},{"sentence":"Il testimone ha prodotto nuove prove.","translation":"The witness presented new evidence."}],"collocations":["produrre documenti (submit documents)","produrre prove (present evidence)","produrre un certificato (submit a certificate)"],"synonyms":["presentare","esibire","mostrare","fornire"],"antonyms":["nascondere","celare"]}],"etymology":{"value":"From Latin 'prōdūcere' (to lead forth, bring forward, produce), from 'prō-' (forward) + 'dūcere' (to lead).","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/proˈdur.re/","syllables":"pro-dur-re"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_indicative":["produco","produci","produce","produciamo","producete","producono"],"past_historic":["produssi","producesti","produsse","producemmo","produceste","produssero"],"imperfect_indicative":["producevo","producevi","produceva","producevamo","producevate","producevano"],"future_indicative":["produrrò","produrrai","produrrà","produrremo","produrrete","produrranno"],"present_subjunctive":["produca","produca","produca","produciamo","produciate","producano"],"imperfect_subjunctive":["producessi","producessi","producesse","producessimo","produceste","producessero"],"conditional":["produrrei","produrresti","produrrebbe","produrremmo","produrreste","produrrebbero"],"imperative":["produci","produca","produciamo","producete","producano"],"gerund":["producendo"],"past_participle":["prodotto"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Produrre' is a versatile verb with meanings ranging from physical production to causing effects or presenting documents. The specific meaning depends heavily on the context. When referring to manufacturing or agriculture, it means to create or make something. When referring to abstract concepts or events, it means to cause or bring about. It can also mean to present or submit something, such as documents or evidence.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"*Io produco a la fabbrica.","correct":"Io produco nella fabbrica.","note":"Use 'nella' (in the) to indicate location of production."},{"incorrect":"*Produrre un problema.","correct":"Causare un problema.","note":"While 'produrre' can mean 'to cause', it's often better to use 'causare' for negative outcomes like problems."},{"incorrect":"*Produrre una persona.","correct":"Presentare una persona.","note":"To introduce someone, use 'presentare' instead of 'produrre'."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["produttore (producer)","produzione (production)","prodotto (product)","produttivo (productive)","produttività (productivity)"],"compound_words":["riprodurre (reproduce)","sovraprodurre (overproduce)","sottoprodurre (underproduce)"],"phrases":["catena di produzione (production line)","costi di produzione (production costs)"]},"level_frequency":{"wordfrequency":"Common","priority":"★★★"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"The verb 'produrre' is used to describe the act of creating or making something, like a factory producing goods. It can also mean causing something to happen, like a decision producing a result. You can also use it to mean showing or presenting something, like documents. It's a useful word to know for talking about manufacturing, business, and cause and effect."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"L'Italia produce molti vini pregiati.","translation":"Italy produces many fine wines.","type":"general","meaning_category":"manufacturing"},{"sentence":"La crisi economica ha prodotto disoccupazione.","translation":"The economic crisis has caused unemployment.","type":"general","meaning_category":"cause and effect"},{"sentence":"Il testimone deve produrre una prova.","translation":"The witness must present evidence.","type":"general","meaning_category":"presenting"}]}
